question_stem:
Refer to the attached pdf SAS output. It contains output from fitting a multiple linear regression model to the bike2 dataset. The dependent variable was registered. The explanatory variables were casual, workingday and season. There was also an interaction term fitted.

Write down the equations corresponding to

non-working day in summer, and
working day in winter.


How many coefficients are there in the model? Which ones have been set to 0?
Comment on the residual versus casual plot.
Which point has the highest leverage? What is the season and workingday status for this point?
question_stem_html:
Refer to the attached pdf SAS output. It contains output from fitting a multiple linear regression model to the bike2 dataset. The dependent variable was registered. The explanatory variables were casual, workingday and season. There was also an interaction term fitted.

  1. Write down the equations corresponding to
    • non-working day in summer, and
    • working day in winter.
  2. How many coefficients are there in the model? Which ones have been set to 0?
  3. Comment on the residual versus casual plot.
  4. Which point has the highest leverage? What is the season and workingday status for this point?
